questions.quote: OK Look, the gum isn't cutting it for me. We need to be about something else...anything..please.
Hey, I just saw a pig man! A pig man! Ya know he was sleeping and then he woke up and he looked up at me an-and he made this horrible sound, this .
...pianist. A *classical* pianist. She *plays* the piano. She's a *brilliant* woman. I-I-I sat in her living room... She played the *Waldstein Sonata*! The *Waldstein*!
Yeah! Then after the ambulance left, I found the toe! So I put it in a Cracker Jack box, filled it with ice, and took off for the hospital.
"That's the guy who took the bread out of Jimmy's mouth. Jimmy's out of work because of you..
You can't keep this up. Don't you know what's going to happen? Everytime you shave it, it's going to come in thicker and fuller and darker.
I can't stand these guys. You give your number to them and then they don't call. Why do they do that?
An hour and a half!!! I was reading a manuscript, I just couldn't put it down.
You sure you want to do this? I'm going to be on the road for three weeks!
Well, you know, I was thinking - if things don't exactly work out..
